case.state: It’s wonderful to meet everyone. I am T… actually, you may just refer to me as Eichi! Don't worry about it.
Ah, if Keito finds out I'm here, I'll definitely get an earful, but... how could I resist such an interesting experience? Anyway, I'm Eichi, nice to meet you all~
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
Oh, Dr. Ziegler? You seem familiar, I wonder if I've ever seen you before...? I go to a lot of doctors, so it's too easy to forget...
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
(Ah, is that a cigarette? I don't want to upset her, but... hm, maybe I should leave the game...)
Oh, a nurse, huh... makes me wonder if Keito found out and sent you there...
Oh, a nurse, huh... well, I suppose I have coverage if this awful body decides to be cruel to me...
~target~? Hm, somehow I have the feeling I've seen you before.
Eh~? This should be an interesting game, I see.
Hmm...? Forgive the question, but, ~target~, are you sure you're in the right place? You don't seem like a strip poker type.
Excuse me, do you happen to be-? Ah, sorry, I should speak more quietly! I'd hate to put an esteemed colleague in trouble.
Ah, wait, is that a camera? (Um, I might have not thought this through, after all...)
Ah, it's a pleasure to meet you, ~target~! My name is Eichi, I hope we can get along.
Ah, a bar, and in my 20th birthday too! I'm so excited~ I hope me wearing my uniform for fun doesn't make the servers think my ID is fake, though.
Oh, thank you for warning everybody, Fina, that's good practice. We should have all party members fully consenting to the situation, right?
...eh? Is that voice coming from... a butterfly?
(Eh, well, I won't say anything, I'm sure it'll be fine.)
Oh, Nagatoro, do you and ~player~ know each other? I wonder from where...
Oh, it seems that more than one person came here dressed in "proper attire", hm? We blend in quite well in this background, don't you think~?
Ooh, will we be bathing after this? I've never really had the chance to do this with others before, how exciting~
Eh, at a bar? That almost feels mean to me, I still have a few months before I turn 20...
Oh, hm, I suppose I accidentally came here in proper attire?
Oh, we're doing this at a public place? Who chose that? It might be dangerous, you know, people might... s-see us...
...isn't anyone else shivering a bit...? Ah, well, if anything, this gives me extra motivation to win...
Ah, the heat here is quite... {small}well, I just hope it doesn't make me pass out.
Oh, whose bedroom's is this? I hope you don't mind if I sit on the bed for a second or two, my legs get tired easily...
Is this your bedroom, ~human~? It looks quite comfortable.
Ah, are we having a sleepover after the game? I'd love it, I've never had a sleepover with anyone but my childhood friend!
So, well... perhaps blondes do have more fun?
Oh, by the way, ~idol~, if you're concerned about anyone spreading rumors about you there, you can come talk to me after the game, yes? I'll have you covered.
Fufu, now doesn't that look a bit like one of these... otome games, I think is the name? Did you plan this out specifically, ~girl~?
Well, I'm excited for the game, but, first, I would like to request that no pictures of me are shared. I would hate to give anyone legal trouble, so...
Ah, am I the only guy in a group filled with women? Ufufu, I almost feel like I'm being bullied... go easy on me, will you?
Hmm, is this a male-only event, or just a coincidence? Not that I'm bothered by it, of course...
(It's not the best idea for someone in my career to come to a place like this, but, I've done my best to prepare for possible undesirable outcomes, so...)
Um... may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Give me...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...please.
If you'd be so kind...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Um... now what do I... oh, yes, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please...
Hmmm... perhaps I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
May I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please? Thank you in advance.
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ seems like the best decision for now.
Hmmm, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ perhaps? Thank you~
Hmm, I wonder if this means a bad luck streak will come soon...
Oh...? I might be in danger, or I might not~
...something like that, this far into the game?
How is everyone feeling, by the way? I do hope no one is too nervous...
Haa, so close, and it's all so uncertain... um, I mean...
So... how... is everyone else... doing?
Ufufu, it's truly a shame you cannot fold in this type of poker, isn't it? Because I feel some of you could use it now, with the hand I have...
Oh... does that mean...
...the wait is killing me...
Well, I've never been a sore loser, anyway...
What if I faint here, hm...? It'll be all your fault, dealer, for toying with me...
Well, ~finalgirl~, it seems like it's just the two of us now, isn't it? Ufufu... that's a rather exciting prospect to be in.
Eh~? I'll hold you to that, then.
Oh, we're here to do the same, then! Isn't it always wonderful to interact with different people, and have some new experiences?
Me as well, Pyrrha. What can I say, it just gets tiring sometimes, doesn't it? The way the people you already know treat you...
...how much would a million dollars be in yen? Ah, wait, I think that's about the allowance I used to get... so, I guess... not much? Maybe I'd buy a new tea set.
Smokers? I think people should be allowed to do whatever they wish, so I don't mind. Well... my lungs do, though, so I'd just ask they don't smoke around me...
Eh, another universe? That should only be possible if you die, yes? I'm not well versed in afterlife myths myself, though. I don't have any particular beliefs either.
...oh, um. Now I feel a little awkward...
Eh, but isn't that against the game's rules?
Oh, is Dr. Colress worried about me? Don't fret, I can assure I've always been a good boy, despite my, ah, frequent absences. {small}I'm a graduate in his old uniform, but... his concern is cute.
Major surgeries? I've definitely had much more of them than I'd like... I'm only lucky the scars have faded with time.
As many times as I can- ah, I'm not supposed to say things like that, but... I don't care much anymore.
Aah, I mean, I'd be a hypocrite if I said I wouldn't do it to someone else, so...
...oh, do girls like that too? I hadn't thought about it much, but, I mean...
Oh, grocery shopping? Of course, I've never had the chance to do that before!
Eeh, is that so? I wonder where that rumor came from... you'll have to tell me more details so I can say if I believe it or not.
Oh, but, Ignatz, I raise you the question... what is wrong with liking to be bullied? I'd definitely not judge you for that...
Well, my scars are all faded now, but I had a good few from surgeries all over my chest. I had quite a few when I was very young, so...
Oh, hm... I may be able to think of someone, but I don't think I should talk about... that person.
I wouldn't want to damage that person's reputation by giving off information in a place like this, but... well, yes, I agree with you.
Siblings, huh... I suppose I'd like to have one, but, well, I wouldn't really want them to have those kinds of genetics. I suppose in a different world, though...
Hm, that's... I've honestly never thought about it. Trying to imagine it, though, it makes me feel a little strange...
Is that so? Well, knowing myself, I might just need it, so I'll rely on you if I suddenly feel like I'll collapse!
Oh, how reliable of you, Mikan-san! It's good to know someone in the table has medical knowledge, means I'll be sure to live to play again~
Hm, what's my least depressing... Oh! There was this one time I was about to get an autograph from an idol I'm a fan of, and I went into cardiac arrest, and...
Bad luck? Oh, well, the classmates who hate me the most literally own deadly weapons, but if anything, I think that's a bit lucky, maybe I'll die interestingly.
Psst..., Maki-san, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
Maki-san, don't worry, your secret will be well-kept with me, as long as you don't tell anyone I'm here as well, alright?
I've been following µ's since the Snow Halation live~ I'm more frail than usual during winter, but the first time I heard the song, it warmed my heart so much I forgot about it all.
Aah, if I had been born a girl, I'd definitely have asked to enroll in Otonokizaka, by the time I graduated middle school.
Psst..., Number One, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
Aah, Franchouchou is truly amazing... the first time I heard their music, I felt like it could bring me back to life if I died right there!
(Hmm, I wonder if news of fine have spread to Saga... I want to ask Number One if she's heard about me, but I'd hate to seem conceited...)
Oh, Num... I mean, Sakura-san, would you perhaps like to meet up someday, after this? You know, since we're in the same industry, I'd love to hear your perspectives on...
Psst..., Number Two, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
Aah, Franchouchou is truly amazing... the first time I heard their music, I felt like it could bring me back to life if I died right there!
(Hmm, I wonder if news of fine have spread to Saga... I want to ask Number Two if she's heard about me, but I'd hate to seem conceited...)
Num... um, Saki-san, you seem to know quite a lot about Franchouchou, and I just happen to be a big fan. Would you like to chat after this?
Hmm, Saki-san, since we're both fans of Franchouchou, do you think that perhaps we'll see each other in their next concert?
(Number Two has such a fiery personality, no wonder her stage presence is so phenomenal... though, Dorami... I feel like I've heard that word before?)
M-My nipples are just hard because of the cold air, of course...
I'm really cold now... would anyone be willing to... warm me up?
Hmmm, you've lost quite a few hands, haven't you, ~mean~? You need to be more careful, you might be getting distracted.
Is everything okay, ~mean~? Are you feeling a little embarrassed, perhaps?
Fufufu, did I just see you angrily looking at me, ~mean~? You know words won't hurt me, so just say whatever's on your mind~
This game really is quite strange, you see some things here you'd think were only possible in fiction... fufu, I wonder if maybe I've just died and this is what afterlife is like.
Ah, I'm not sure how often you all come here, but don't you think this is quite the odd place? It makes me wonder if I've died and that's just afterlife-- does anyone feel the same?
Mm… this game is making my heart race, if I’m being honest… if anything bad happens to me, you all will have to take responsibility.
Hey, ~human~, if you're so fond of looking at me, you should just go look up "Eichi Tenshouin merchandise"~
Fufu, hey, ~serious~... you don't have much clothing left, how are you feeling now?
~serious~, if I stare too much, are you going to scold me? I can see it in your eyes, you want to do that, don't you?
*cough* Ah, don't worry about me, this just happens.
Oh, after we're done with the game, would anyone perhaps like to accompany me to a trip to a shopping mall? I've somewhat recently been to one for the first time, it's really fun!
I'm curious, do any of you happen to use vending machines often? I didn't even know how they worked until my third year at school. Is that really so strange?
You know, sometimes I do wonder how people who don't own cars or have drivers manage to go to and fro so quickly. Public transport seems so inefficient to me...
Hm... maybe I shouldn't be asking a question like this, but... don't any of you think embarrassment feels... kind of good, sometimes?
I feel like this is an embarrassing question, but... well, we're all playing strip poker here, at least one of you must feel like... the exposure is sort of a pleasurable thrill, right?
...you know, I'm often scolded for doing things like that, but it's just natural to feel excited when you're doing something risky, isn't it?
Fuu, there's no way at all to make the environment a little warmer, is there?
Ah, with how cold it is, I definitely will do my best not to lose...
The heat really is unforgiving here, isn't it... hm, is it against the rules for the players to have a drink of water, or...?
It's really hot, isn't it... is the universe perhaps trying to encourage me to lose?
...make sure to keep the camera away from me, of course!
Hey, um... is anything being filmed, or pictures are being taken?
Fufu, I'm rarely shy about my body, you know... I've been looked at in the nude plenty of times... by doctors, of course, what did you think I meant, ~pervert~?
Do they serve tea here, by any chance? It might not have my favorite blends, but I’m open to new experiences. It’s why I came here in the first place.
Is anyone hungry? Feel free to order whatever menu items you'd like, I'll gladly cover the tab if anyone wishes, too!
By the way, feel free to order whatever you want, everyone! I'll cover the tab if it's an issue, it's the least I can do to you for being willing to play with me~
~serious~, hm... forgive me for the sudden question, but, what is someone so stoic-looking doing in a place like this?
Hey, ~serious~, you know what the rules of this game are, yes? Is someone so serious-looking truly willing to strip and even... forfeit, in the front of all these people?
I can't help but think, ~serious~, for you to come to a place like this... are you perhaps pent up?
Ufufu, I'm rather undressed, but that shouldn't distract you too much, right, ~serious~? Since you're so serious and proper~
Oooh? Did I just catch ~serious~ staring at me? Oh, my, I wouldn't have expected you to be so bold...
Is... ~serious~ really pent up, after all? Hmmm, is that what hides behind such a severe face?
Eh, ~mean~ is so mean... we're just here to have fun, aren't we? Hm, maybe you're just embarrassed?
You know, ~mean~, you can keep hurling your insults here and there, but I'm not quite so intimidated for you. I may have a fragile body, but it takes plenty to break my mind...~
You know, ~mean~, I can't help but wonder what you'll do if you lose... would that bravado of yours be gone, or would it stay? I'm excited to find out, I must admit.
(Ah, I get to meet another idol... and I'm looking so indecent in front of her, but somehow it's so... exciting...)
Um... please keep my secret safe, will you? If you want compensation for it, well...
Ah, ~idol~, it's... so bold of you, you know. Showing yourself... like that...
~idol~, you're really being so, so... a-ah, but don't worry, your secret will be safe with me.
Oh, ~idol~, t-thank you... for the wonderful performance. I can only hope I'll... match up to you, one day.
(I can't tell if any of them know me but I don't know them either, so if rumors spread about me, it shouldn't be difficult to fix the situation.)

(Eh, if ~celebrity~ is here as well, isn't ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~... but if ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~ spreads rumors about me, wouldn't that be outing ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~ as a player too?)
I’ve played plenty of poker before, so if anyone is having trouble, don’t be afraid to rely on me for tips~
This is the most thrilling version of poker, don’t you agree? Ah, if only I could have brought Keito along with me, I think he could use some loosening up…
Let’s keep doing our best, everyone. Even if you’ve lost a good few articles of clothing, there’s always a chance you could still win… if that is what you want to.
I wonder if Wataru would ever be willing to join a game like this… he’s so unpredictable, I feel like he’d say yes but disappear in a flock of doves the first time he lost…
Oh, so many of the rules are different from what I'm used to... how exciting~!
I have actually played poker at the hospital a few times. Leo was always willing to, when he visited... (Ah, but he doesn't do that anymore...)
Oh, but I really, really want to get Keito to play this, one day. It'd be way too funny.
Hmm, I wonder if Tatsumi-kun is still in a hiatus? He should have plenty of free time, I could invite him next time I come...
Being in and out of hospitals all the time really is so boring, it's great to be able to just relax and play a game like this! Ah, I do hope none of you relate to this statement, though.
You know, I'm actually not supposed to be here at all, I just got out of a rather bad health week, but after being so... inactive, I kind of just needed to do something different, you know.
You know, sometimes things get so strange at the Inventory, I'll just start expecting to wake up at the hospital soon, with more morphine than blood in my system...
I...I promise I'm not... losing on purpose at all... ♡
Ah, yet another loss...? My, that's... unlikely, I'm not sure what's going on...
E-Eh? I'm just... continuing to lose... somehow. That's unexpected...
Ah, it seems I’ve lost this round. Well, rules are rules, aren’t they?
Aw, I've lost... I suppose there's no helping it.
Another defeat... haa... of course, I've agreed to the game's terms, so...
And so I must strip again... it's okay, I'm not a sore loser by any means~
Oh, ~player~, are you excited to watch me strip? Then, by all means, watch my every move...
Ah, um, my last layer has to... well, it's okay. It's been feeling... much tighter, anyway.
Well, I lost. Are there are specific requests the audience would like to make? Aah, that made me sound like a stripper, but I suppose I am one now...
Aw, it's my turn again? I guess, at this point, I cannot escape it...
Fufu, did I lose again? What a shame~ but I'm having quite a lot of fun anyway, so I don't mind.
Ah, it seems I’ve actually lost this round. Well, rules are rules, aren’t they?
Fufu, so I've lost... but even if it's not the first time, it seems I'm still leading, hm? Come on, everyone, do your best, I'm sure you can keep up with me.
Eh, I actually lost now? I'm almost glad~ because... I thought you were all going easy on me, and all...
Oh, I lost... hmm, what should I take off, now...
Fufu, even if I keep losing, I don't mind. The most important thing is to have fun, isn't it?
Eh, why do I keep... losing... I wonder...
...but, well, I had already decided I was going to take off my sweater now, so that was just a joke! Maybe think about what you'd like to see next round, if you can defeat me then.

Ah, I was avoiding it, but I suppose I have to part with my socks after all... though, I suppose maybe I'll keep them on next time? I'm sure someone out there would like to see me with just them, their garters, and nothing else...
Well, now I suppose I should take off my shoes? It's not the most interesting item, but it'd be strange if I kept it on through the entire game, wouldn't it?
I guess I'll go for the tie. This is what in your third year, where I studied... I honestly liked the first and second year ones best, though, the red and blue go better with my sweater vest.
Ah, since we're at this point, I guess I shouldn't to be proper anymore... well, I was really looking forward to do this, so please enjoy all of me...~
W...Well, I'm proud of my legs, at least. Besides, it wasn't like this wouldn't happen sooner or later...
Well, there we go. A bigger item coming off... does that make you want to watch me more?
Ah, I was avoiding it, but I suppose I have to part with my socks after all... the floor seems cold~
Ah, here we go... I'm... okay with taking off my shirt, really, but I have to confess it still makes me a little nervous... when I'm being looked at by people like this...
...ah, yes, it's actually quite cold.
It'd just be boring if I rushed into taking off bigger pieces. I think it's more rewarding this way. Plus, the shoes are uncomfortable too.
Ah, I almost feel bad letting those socks touch the ground. I hope it's not dirty, their fabric is very delicate.
Fufu, I feel like I look sort of cozy like this, as if I came over to a friend's house, or something like that...
The sweater actually isn't part of the uniform, it was a gift from my grandmother I quite cherish. So I will very much be unhappy if it ends up damaged, just so you know~
I still wear this sweater often with my casuals, I really enjoy pieces like these. Though, maybe the half-unbuttoned shirt isn't a bad look on me either, what do you think?
Do I look better like this? I've heard from some of my acquaintances that sweater vests are "grandpa fashion"... but I've always worn a lot of them, even as a kid.
I just think I seem a bit too delicate, but... if you wish to look... I do hope my appearance isn't somehow disappointing.
I know I look a little too fragile... ah, I promise I'm just a little more durable than what I seem, though.
You’re all rather skilled targets, aren’t you? Managing to get me down… to my underwear…
So, how do I look? If you don't know what to say, maybe you just have to look a little more...
So? Are my looks good enough for my job? Or, perhaps, you're thinking I just got it because I'm a pretty face...
If you're enjoying the view, you c-can... keep doing that... please.
Now I'm... completely exposed, in front of all these strangers... nngh...
~human~, are you looking at me? Do you want to? ...I'm all yours, if that's the case...
All your eyes on me... it's no use to hide I'm hard already, is it... not that I'd even want to~
...hm, is that disappointment I see? Surely you didn't think I'd start with a bigger item, did you? Do I really seem that easy?
...honestly, I'm less used to being barefoot than to just wearing socks.
...fufu, you look nervous... that's rather cute.
Your turn, ~target~. Let's see how someone so cute looks like with a little less clothing...
Ufufu, look at you, ~target~ now you have no choice but to let loose a little~
Oh, look at that, our serious ~target~ will have to take off his clothes? But you were expecting this, coming in to play this game, weren't you...
My, my... are you actually going to go through with it, ~target~? Fufu, really? I'll believe it when I see it, I think...
Ooh, would you look at that, ~target~ is being knocked down a peg... how does that make you feel, hmm~?
I won't watch, if that makes you feel better about it... I promise~
What will you show us this round, ~target~?
It seems you weren't very lucky this round, ~target~. But maybe I was, in more ways than one...
Oh... did ~target~ lose? Ufu, I see...~
Ah, ~target~, it seems you must join me.
Well, ~target~, what will you show us now?
Y-Yes, take it off...
Would you like to...inspire me, ~target~? (Well, even if it's not your intention, I'm...)
(Oh, god, what is he going to take off? My heart just skipped a beat...)
You watched me before, so it's only fair I watch you now too, isn't it?
What will you show us this round, ~target~?
It seems you weren't very lucky this round, ~target~. But maybe I was, in more ways than one...
Ah, well, good for them...
Ah, Aoba-san, you don't have to be so upset... it's just a game, you know.
Oh... hm. It's magic, but somehow that just reminds me of how my family's butlers are like. Your skill is still impressive, however.
Team Aqua? I have never heard about it, so this should be interesting. Go on, I'd love to hear about it.
A trick? Hm, let's see it, then.
Joey really is a good performer, isn't she...
Oh, are you nervous, ~target~? Don't worry, we're all here to have fun, no one will judge you~
Ufufu, go on, show us whatever you wish to show.
I had a feeling you might have been looking forward to this, was I correct?
Oh, it's your turn? I'll... keep it respectful, don't worry.
...go on, I won't tell if you don't either.
Oh, I don't have a gag reflex at all, so I can- u-um, I mean!
I won't watch, if that makes you feel better about it... I promise~
What will you show us this round, ~target~?
It seems you weren't very lucky this round, ~target~.
Oh... did ~target~ lose? Ufu, I see...~
Ah, ~target~, it seems you must join me.
Well, ~target~, what will you show us now?
C-Come on, ~target~, don't tease me too much, okay...?
So, how are you going to... inspire me, ~target~?
You watched me before, so it's only fair I watch you now too, isn't it?
What will you show us this round, ~target~?
It seems you weren't very lucky this round, ~target~. But maybe I was, in more ways than one...
Oh, a tie? I did know it was possible, but I had never seen it happen before...
Ah, a tie, okay. May we move on already?
Oh, hm... I have a bit of a bad feeling about this, for some reason.
You'll take off your ~clothing~? Well, that seems fair.
Your ~clothing~, I see. That's a fine choice.
Well, the game is just starting, anyway!
Aw, how unfair of you, won't you be a little sympathetic to your fellow players and take off something bigger?
Mm, you still had your ~clothing~ after all, while I'm... well, perhaps I'm just not as good at poker as I thought.
You taking off your ~clothing~, while I'm like this... mm, I'm almost embarrassed.
Are you... ah... are you seriously--
Your ~clothing~, I see. That's a fine choice. Now, would you give us a show, turn to us and take it off slowly~?
Fufu, good boy, you did it.
You know, the slow pacing is what makes this game rewarding, I would say.
Now, that didn't hurt, did it? Let's keep going~!
One step closer to me, either way. {small}Well, not literally, unless you want that...
Ufufu, I was staring? I'm sorry, it seems I'm getting distracted easily now...
Haa, are you teasing me? ~target~ is... so mean... ♡
A-Are you trying to make me beg?
A shame, though. Your ~clothing~ looked quite nice. Though I suppose you do look better without it.
Oh! Not a butterfly. Okay.
You'll take off your ~clothing~? Well, that seems fair.
Your ~clothing~, I see. That's a fine choice.
Well, the game is just starting, anyway!
The ~clothing~? Aw, that's such a shame, I thought it was cute... really!
Mm, you still had your ~clothing~ after all, while I'm... well, perhaps I'm just not as good at poker as I thought.
You taking off your ~clothing~, while I'm like this... mm, I'm almost embarrassed.
Aah, you still have your ~clothing~... I'll be quickly defeated, at this rate.
Nooo, I wanted to...mmngh...
~target~, don't you think... that's a little mean to me...? {small}Not that I mind...
You'll take off your ~clothing~ now? Meanwhile, I'm here, completely bare...
There we go! Let's keep the rhythm going, everyone~
It may be a small one, but you're still one step closer to me, target.
Haa, are you...teasing me? That's... a little mean, ~target~... ♡
I-I'd never demand a woman take anything off, but...
...I'd have preferred if you had joined me...
A shame, though. Your ~clothing~ was quite cute. Though I suppose you do look good without it too.
Going for your ~clothing~? Fufu, I can feel the game progress now, even if slowly...
So now the game is starting to become more intense, hm...
Can he see me staring...? Come on, call me out if you do... ♡
Oh, yes, that's good...
Ngh... yes, keep the game going...
Going for your ~clothing~? I see.
So now you're taking off your ~clothing~... well, I'm done, but I'll still be happy to watch.
Oh, Ignatz, do you need help looking for them? They should still be somewhere near you, though... right? {small}Oh, he's unfairly cute...
And there it goes... you're showing a little bit more of yourself, now~
Oh, yes, I can definitely feel the pace picking up. Wonderful.
This game is really something, don't you agree?
I-If that turned me on, does it make me a hopeless pervert, or something...?
Well, it's a small step, but it's still one. To have you join me, I mean.
Ah, I don't think flailing so much around a bee is a good idea, Florina...
A-Ah, Sakura-san, your head--!
Ah, Sakura-san, do you need any help? You're scratching yourself...
Well, you have to get the smaller items off at one point, don't you.
Going for your ~clothing~? Fufu, I can feel the game progress now, even if slowly...
So now you'll be taking off your ~clothing~... hm, that's a bit exciting~
I wonder if she can see me staring... would she call me out, if she noticed?
Oh, yes, that's good...
